title: Jeppview as VMWare Workstation
description:
Some users have difficulty setting up this excellent program. It has been around since 2008 and it'll be difficult to start from scratch. Since a few years ago, I believe the program started to check its serial and obviously the widely circulated one is banned and the program will refused to run anymore permanently on your computer. Therefore, the solution is to run it inside a virtual machine with no internet access, it is not required anyway.

Therefore this is my contribution to the flightsim community by making my virtual machine available. 


Blue sky!

Cessna_pilot
